Event.EventName: A friend suggests doing a quiz at your house.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Say yes and have the quiz at your house.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You do the quiz at your house and have a great time with your friends, however, this has increased the likelihood of spreading the virus.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Say no and suggest doing the quiz on facetime.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You do the quiz on facetime and have a great time with your friends.
